TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TraceContextEventHandler(object sender, TraceContextEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed TraceContextEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TraceContextEventHandler(sender As Object, e As TraceContextEventArgs)
public delegate void TraceContextEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, TraceContextEventArgs ^ e);
type TraceContextEventHandler = delegate of obj * TraceContextEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 物件之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何註冊委派，以便處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to register a delegate to handle the event. 在此範例中，`OnTraceFinished`方法逐一查看追蹤記錄，並將其寫入至回應資料流。In this example, the `OnTraceFinished` method iterates through the trace records and writes them to the response stream. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]
